sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn shì wǒ lái chǔlǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vais m'occuper de cette affaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I will handle this matter.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng fān dào dì shí yè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez tourner à la page dix.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please turn to page ten.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fǎnzhèng wǒ yǐjīng juédìng le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: De toute façon, j'ai déjà décidé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Anyway, I have already decided.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Háizi duì shìjiè chōngmǎn hàoqí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants sont pleins de curiosité pour le monde.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Children are full of curiosity about the world.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì bāshí niándài de gēqǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une chanson des années quatre-vingt.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a song from the eighties.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 哪怕只有一点希望，我也不会放弃。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǎpà zhǐyǒu yīdiǎn xīwàng, wǒ yě bù huì fàngqì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Même s'il n'y a qu'un peu d'espoir, je n'abandonnerai pas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Even if there is only a little hope, I won't give up.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì gōngsī de fǎlǜ gùwèn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est le conseiller juridique de l'entreprise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is the legal advisor of the company.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Cānjiā de rén bùzhǐ yībǎi rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a plus de cent participants.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are more than one hundred participants.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shí nián qián wǒ láiguò zhèlǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis venu ici il y a dix ans.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I came here ten years ago.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wèntí déyǐ jiějué.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le problème a pu être résolu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The problem was able to be solved.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā tuōlí le wēixiǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est sorti du danger.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He escaped from danger.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 高速公路上禁止骑自行车。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gāosù gōnglù shàng jìnzhǐ qí zìxíngchē.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est interdit de faire du vélo sur l'autoroute.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Cycling is prohibited on the highway.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā xǐhuan chuān míngpái yīfu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle aime porter des vêtements de marque.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She likes to wear brand-name clothes.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā diǎntóu biǎoshì tóngyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a hoché la tête pour montrer son accord.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He nodded to show agreement.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā pǎo de xiàng fēng shìde.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il court comme le vent.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He runs like the wind.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们要用辩证的眼光看事物。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yào yòng biànzhèng de yǎnguāng kàn shìwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons voir les choses avec un regard dialectique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should look at things with a dialectical view.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yùndòngyuán de jīròu hěn fādá.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les muscles des athlètes sont très développés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Athletes have well-developed muscles.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 老板同意了我的请假申请。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǎobǎn tóngyì le wǒ de qǐngjià shēnqǐng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le patron a approuvé ma demande de congé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The boss approved my leave request.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 旅行的费用由公司承担。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǚxíng de fèiyòng yóu gōngsī chéngdān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les frais de voyage sont pris en charge par l'entreprise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The travel expenses are covered by the company.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这是一家大型企业集团。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī jiā dàxíng qǐyè jítuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un grand groupe d'entreprises.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a large enterprise group.
